legacy.full_text:
the scale of data collection in the AI labs pales in comparison to 2010s google

it’s mostly web scraping and data-labeling. compare that to diligently photographing streets of every country, mapping earth via satellite, scanning every book known to man.. now *that* was ambitious

legacy.description: Applied developmental cybernetics researcher, aspiring thewmaster, CEO of Softmax. Currently looking for a field theory of mind.
legacy.name: Emmett Shear

legacy.full_text: I find the future increasingly hard to visualize because I think we are going to significantly expand and alter our senses and perceptions, and it’s quite hard to imagine what the resulting experience will be like. How do you imagine a world w sight, when everyone has been blind?

veo3 is far too pricey to use just for personal fun all the time, so the primary high-volume use case will be for bulk youtube shorts monetiziation. this is the first time (i think?) an sota genai model provider also owns the resulting distribution of much of what users will make

legacy.full_text: I spent this morning reproducing with o3 Anthropic's result that Claude Sonnet 4 will, under sufficiently extreme circumstances, escalate to calling the cops on you. o3 will too: https://t.co/f7pvt8CMsk. But honestly, I think o3 and Claude are handling this scenario correctly.
